definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Kanwa dictionary is a main kind of Japanese philological dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 汉和辞典是日本语文词典的一个主要门类。

sentences.english: The skill of paper is a door of old and modern traditional artistic class.
sentences.chinese: 纸艺是一门既古老又现代的传统艺术门类。

sentences.english: The embroidery of the Miao Nationality is one of the important categories in China's embroidery art.
sentences.chinese: 苗绣是我国刺绣艺术中的一个重要门类。

sentences.english: Cultural industry is a very large category for certain types of businesses.
sentences.chinese: 文化产业无疑是一个非常大的产业门类。

sentences.english: Printmaking , is also an important Chinese art classes.
sentences.chinese: 版画，也是中国美术的一个重要门类。

sentences.english: They are of the same class.
The handicraft of blue allover is one of the important kinds of traditional handicraft.
sentences.chinese: 蓝印花布是传统工艺的重要门类。

sentences.english: Immortal-taoism opera is important in Zaju of the Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 神仙道化剧乃元杂剧中的一个重要门类。

sentences.english: A great quantity of welding consumables is used in Jiangsu since it is a large province with various industry.
sentences.chinese: 江苏作为经济大省，工业门类繁多，焊材使用量大。

sentences.english: However, the kinds of manufacturing will necessarily change.
sentences.chinese: 然而，制造业门类必将有所改变。

sentences.english: Mineral medicine is one of three categories of traditional Chinese medicine.
sentences.chinese: 矿物药是传统中药三大门类之一。

sentences.english: In decorative art, plant pattern is an important kind of decorative theme.
sentences.chinese: 在装饰艺术中，植物纹样是装饰题材的重要门类。

sentences.english: What section of the bookstore do you usually peruse?
sentences.chinese: 你经常在书店里浏览哪个门类？

sentences.english: Binxing study is an emerging branch within the field of Imperial Examination(IE) study.
sentences.chinese: “宾兴研究”是科举学的新兴研究门类。

sentences.english: Classical music hardly seems like a growth business.
sentences.chinese: 经典音乐很难被视为有增长潜力的商业门类。

sentences.english: A great range of cheeses fall into this category.
sentences.chinese: 这个门类下的乳酪大军可谓浩浩荡荡。

definition: to skim (through a book)/to read cursorily/to dip into
